ck3_beagle.hiddenDependencies.useOfSaved.markdownDescription: What is the severity of the smell **Overcomplicated Trigger: Use of Saved Scope**?
Is using a saved scope in a macro allowed if a preceding comment uses the name of the saved scope?
Is using a saved scope in a macro allowed if the macro's name uses the name of the saved scope?
Is using a saved scope in a macro allowed if the macro is in an event file?
Which saved scope names are always allowed in macros?

ck3_beagle.hiddenDependencies.useOfVaria.markdownDescription: What is the severity of the smell **Overcomplicated Trigger: Use of Variable**?
Is using a variable in a macro allowed if a preceding comment uses the name of the saved scope?
Is using a variable in a macro allowed if the macro's name uses the name of the saved scope?
Is using a variable in a macro allowed if the macro is in an event file?
Which variable names are always allowed in macros?
